Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help

Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help can be acquired during Act 1 as one of the methods to Find a Cure, a Main Quest in BG3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Ask the Goblin
